title.rendered: Jacob Talley: Net Worth 2023, Career Earnings

content.rendered:
Summary

  • About Jacob Talley
    • Early Career
    • Professional Career
  • Jacob Talley’s Net Worth in 2023
    • Career Earnings
    • Endorsements
  • Personal Details
    • Wife
    • How old is he?
    • How tall is he?
    • What is his nationality?
    • Career Highlights
    • FAQs About Jacob Talley 

Jacob Talley is a professional steer wrestler from Keatchie, Louisiana, who has been competing in the Professional Rodeo Cowboys Association (PRCA) since 2010. He has qualified for the Wrangler National Finals Rodeo (NFR) five times.

Here you can follow Jacob Talley’s net worth, career earnings, career, biography, achievements, relationship status, and more.

About Jacob Talley

Jacob Talley hails from Keatchie, Louisiana. His father, Jeff, owns a water well drilling company; his mother, Amy, owns a gym; and his younger brother, Eric, competes in the Southeastern Circuit as a steer wrestler.

Early Career

Talley’s early career in rodeo was marked by some adversity. He faced a significant setback when he tore his pectoral muscle in 2019 at Red Bluff, California.

Despite this, he made a strong comeback in 2020, finishing the regular season in the Top 2.

Professional Career

Jacob Talley is a professional steer wrestler who has been competing in the Professional Rodeo Cowboys Association (PRCA) since 2012.

Talley has qualified for the National Finals Rodeo (NFR) five times. He has had a successful career, with his earnings in 2022 standing at $815,961.

In 2021, he had the best season of his 11-year career, earning $138,329 in a COVID-restricted campaign and finishing seventh in the final PRCA world standings.

He also won the American Rodeo Steer Wrestling Championship in 2021. In 2023, Talley continued to perform well, ranking second in the world standings in March and qualifying for his fifth NFR.

Talley’s career highlights include winning RFD-TV’s The American, which paid its winners $100,000 each, half of which counts toward the world standings. He also won the 2018 Southeastern Circuit Championship.

Jacob Talley’s Net Worth in 2023

As of 2023, Jacob Talley’s net worth is estimated to be $2 million.

He has earned significant income from his successful rodeo career.

Career Earnings

Talley has a successful career with significant earnings. As of 2023, his career earnings stand at $815,961.

The steer wrestler has earned $101,453 in PRCA earnings, securing his fifth National Finals Rodeo qualification.

Endorsements

Jacob Talley is a Team Durango ambassador, indicating a sponsorship or endorsement deal with Durango Boot.

Personal Details

Wife

Jacob Talley’s wife is named Bailey. The couple faced complications when they were expecting their child, Christian, in March 2023.

During this time, Talley chose to stay at home until he was certain that both Bailey and their baby were healthy.

How old is he?

He is 32 years old, as of November 2023.

How tall is he?

Talley is 6 ft tall.

What is his nationality?

He is American.

Career Highlights

  • Career earnings: $815,961
  • 2022 world standings place: 68th
  • 2022 earnings: $21,845
  • Wrangler NFR Qualifications: 4 (2016, 2018, 2020-21)   

2023 Highlights

• Won the Rio Grande Valley Livestock & Rodeo (Mercedes, Texas)

• Won the Franklin (Tenn.) Rodeo

• Won the Crossett (Ark.) Riding Club

• Won the XIT Rodeo & Reunion (Dalhart, Texas)

• Won the Garland County Fair and Rodeo (Hot Springs, Ark.)

• Won the White County Fair Rodeo (Searcy, Ark.)

FAQs About Jacob Talley 

What is Jacob Talley’s net worth?

$2 million as of 2023.

Who is his wife?

Bailey.

What is his biggest rodeo win?

RFD-TV’s The American.
